name: ISSInfo
0:
”Alexa, open ISS Info.”
”Alexa, ask ISS Info about the location of the ISS.”
”Alexa, ask ISS Info when the ISS will fly above New York.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i. s. s. info
des:
Want to learn more about the International Space Station? Alexa helps - with this skill!

"Alexa, ask ISS Info for the map."
"Alexa, ask ISS Info where the ISS currently is."
Alexa will show you the current location of the International Space Station on the world map if you own an Echo Show, Echo Spot or Fire TV. You can also find out which country the ISS is currently flying above.

"Alexa, ask ISS Info when will the ISS fly above Cupertino?"
You'll find out the day, time and duration of the next overflight of the named city.

"Alexa, ask ISS Info about the astronauts on board of the ISS."
With ISS Info, you can always find out which astronauts are on the International Space Station. On an Alexa-enabled device with a display, you'll also see their pictures.

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
